typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as string,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as string,
		Date_Action_Closed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalAuditType
ValidatedDateAndNumber@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidAuditType@ValidAuditType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumber split(not(isNull(Derived_Audit_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Audit_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Audit_ID)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Corrective_Action_Due_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Corrective_Action_Due_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Date_Action_Closed)),not(isNull(Derived_Date_Action_Closed)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndNumber@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Audit_ID = toInteger(Audit_ID),
		Derived_Audit_Date = toDate(Audit_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Corrective_Action_Due_Date = toDate(Corrective_Action_Due_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Date_Action_Closed = toDate(Date_Action_Closed,"dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDateAndNumber
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDateAndNumber@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Audit ID / Other dates fileds in source file")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidAuditType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalIncidentType lookup(Certification_Audit_Type_Code == Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalAuditType
RelationalAuditType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code = Certification_Audit_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalIncidentType
LookupRelationalAuditType split(not(isNull(Relation_Certification_Audit_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidAuditType@(ValidAuditType, InvalidAuditType)
IsValidAuditType@InvalidAuditType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Certification Audit Type Code")) ~> InvalidAuditTypeErrormessage
InvalidAuditTypeErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidAuditType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Audit_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code as string,
		Corrective_Action_Identified as string,
		Audit_Date as string,
		Audit_Classification as string,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date as string,
		Date_Action_Closed as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Audit_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_Audit_Type_Code,
		Corrective_Action_Identified,
		Audit_Date,
		Audit_Classification,
		Corrective_Action_Due_Date,
		Date_Action_Closed,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
